mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.contact_name AS "contactName", a.phone AS "phone", a.business_id AS "businessId", a.id_photos AS "idPhotos", a.open_time AS "openTime", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop( id, name, contact_name, phone, business_id, id_photos, open_time, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{contactName}, #{phone}, #{businessId}, #{idPhotos}, #{openTime}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE shop SET name = #{name}, contact_name = #{contactName}, phone = #{phone}, business_id = #{businessId}, id_photos = #{idPhotos}, open_time = #{openTime}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
